snippet.title: New Spawning System and Upcoming Content - Path of Titans Update
snippet.description:
Play this new update today! ►  https://alderongames.com/store

For more information check out https://pathoftitans.com
Youtube Subscription (click the Bell 🔔to get all updates) ► https://www.youtube.com/c/pathoftitans?sub_confirmation=1
Discord ► https://discord.pathoftitans.com
Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/pathoftitans
Instagram ► https://www.instagram.com/pathoftitans/

Read more about this update here: https://pathoftitans.com/blog/dev-blog-47

Check out our community server sign up form here: https://alderon.games/server-signup

We have some stat balances across all dinosaurs, with improved health and stamina recovery times. Food and water also now drain faster, so it will be important to hunt for prey or search for berry bushes.

We have also added a new quest type, called “Survival Quests”. You will automatically get this quest if your food or water drops below a certain threshold. This Survival quest system will be fleshed out over time to help encourage and incentivize different types of gameplay.

We have improved the way underwater effects look. Water is now quite murky and has small fish swimming in the lakes of Panjura, and we have also implemented a new spawning system that more evenly distributes players across the map, so players will run into one another more frequently.

Check out all these updates and more in-game today!
